[File: api/types/src/view.rs] [Struct: ViewFunction] [Type tag manipulation] Can ty_args vector contain malformed TypeTag entries that bypass Move VM type checking and violate resource safety guarantees? (Critical)

[File: api/types/src/view.rs] [Struct: ViewFunction] [Recursive type] Can ty_args contain recursive or infinitely nested generic types that cause stack overflow during type resolution in the VM? (High)
